testcase.name: Successfully Add Emergency Contact
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Emergency Contacts page....................................passed When clicks on add button of assigned emergency contact.....................passed And enters requuired mandatory details......................................passed And clicks on save button...................................................passed Then contact should be added into emergency contact.........................passed And contact should be displayed into records................................passed

testcase.name: Unsuccessful to Add Emergency Contact
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Emergency Contacts page....................................passed When clicks on add button of assigned emergency contact.....................passed And not enter required mandatory details....................................passed And clicks on save button...................................................passed Then contact should not be added into emergency contact.....................passed

testcase.name: Edit Emergency Contact
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Emergency Contacts page....................................passed When user clicks on edit button of any record...............................passed And enters new data.........................................................passed And clicks on save button...................................................passed Then contact should be edited into emergency contact........................passed And updated contact should be displayed into records........................passed

testcase.name: Delete a single Emergency Contact
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Emergency Contacts page....................................passed When user clicks on delete button of any record of assigned emergency contact.passed And clicks on yes,delete button.............................................passed Then contact should be deleted from emergency contact.......................passed And deleted contacts should not be displayed into emergency contact records.passed

testcase.name: Delete multiple Emergency Contacts
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Emergency Contacts page....................................passed When selects multiple contacts through checkbox.............................passed And clicks on delete selected...............................................passed Then selected contacts should be deleted from emergency contact.............passed And deleted contact should not be displayed into emergency contact records..passed

testcase.name: Successful login
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the login page.............................................passed When user enters vaild credentials..........................................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then user should able to logged in successfully.............................passed

testcase.name: Unsuccessful login
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the login page.............................................passed When user enters invaild credentials........................................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then user should not be able to login and dashboard should not be displayed.passed

testcase.name: Unsuccessful login
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the login page.............................................passed When user enters vaild username and invalid password........................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then user should not be able to login and dashboard should not be displayed.passed

testcase.name: Unsuccessful login
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the login page.............................................passed When user enters invaild username and valid password........................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then user should not be able to login and dashboard should not be displayed.passed

testcase.name: Forgot password
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the login page.............................................passed When user forgot the password...............................................passed And clicks on Forgot your password..........................................passed Then reset password page should be displayed................................passed

testcase.name: sidebar modules
testcase.system-out: Given user is on dashboard page.............................................passed When user clicks on My Info.................................................passed Then PIM page should be displayed...........................................passed And modules of My Info page should be displayed.............................passed
